0.name: TownsVille
0.description: Welcome to the home town of TownsVille, where the name is generic, because I can't think of anything better.

1.name: TownsVille Inn
1.description: This is the Inn at TownsVille.  Feel free to rest up.

2.name: TownsVille Countryside
2.description: You've reached the countryside, where population is sparse.  Be careful as you travel, a monster might find you.

3.name: Dark Woods
3.description: The woods around you block out the light.  There is an eerie feeling in the trees.  Be careful.
